price: 他到了那个火的附近，就有声音喊叫他说：“在火的附近和四周的人，都蒙福佑。赞颂安拉——众世界的主，超绝万物。
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِيَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَا وَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahā nūdiya an būrika man fī al-nāri waman ḥawlahā wasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
